content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option the english title of the pattern is **the emperor s bride socks** >alkuperäinen suomenkielinen ohje vain ullassa 3/14 2 huomaathan että alkuperäisessä ohjeessa on vain yksi koko 72 s ja mallin kärkilevennykset poikkeavat hieman päivitetystä englanninkielisestä versiosta --- **pattern features ** - knitted toe up - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - two sizes small 64 sts and medium/large 72 sts - gusset at the centre of the sole followed by reversed french heel - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork 1 https //payhip com/b/opd4v 2 http //www ullaneule net/0314/ohjeet_keisarin_morsian html
